caption: Perfect spot if you want to try an authentic Ethiopian dish while also enjoying some Italian-American comfort foods like pasta and personal pizzas. This place is a two restaurant combo: Embrace Ethiopia and Pastime Pasta. Both menus are …

Owner of the restaurant helped us out with our order, was very patient and engaging with us, making sure we have everything we needed. He also followed up with us on how our food was and I must say, their chicken and beef tibs were off the …
Outstanding food, well cooked, fresh and always hits the spot. Please do patronize them, restaurants like these need our support to stay alive. Very friendly crew too...
